Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/91st
ShortDescription: 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 87th, Vincennes, 95th, and Halsted due to, street blockage at Halsted/91st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 87th, Vincennes, 95th, and Halsted due to, street blockage at Halsted/91st.

Allow extra travel time.
